title: Style Text Elements
description:
Apply CSS styling to text elements using various selectors.

## Requirements

1. Style `h1` elements:
   - Font size: 2.5rem
   - Color: #1a1a2e
   - Margin bottom: 1rem

2. Style `p` elements:
   - Font size: 1rem
   - Color: #4a4a4a
   - Line height: 1.6

3. Style elements with class `.highlight`:
   - Background color: #fff3cd
   - Padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem

4. Style elements with class `.lead`:
   - Font size: 1.25rem
   - Font weight: 300
   - Color: #6c757d

5. Style `a` (links):
   - Color: #0066cc
   - Text decoration: none
   - On hover (a:hover): text decoration underline

testCases.description: links should have no text decoration

hints: Use line-height: 1.6 for paragraphs (no unit needed)
Use text-decoration: none for links, text-decoration: underline for hover
